name: Power Cell
description:
This is an rts game with only one unit, made for the gmtk jam.

The game is controlled by left clicking on the blue block, moving it then releasing it.

Orange plates are for upgrading buildings, you have to tap them multiple times

Blue plates are for charging batteries. You have to stand on them

To recharge the cube, move to the bottom left machine.

The goal is to finish the building on the top left before the enemies invade your base

There is a .exe and a .zip file, download whichever you prefer,
